titleStmt.title: Additional considerations to these contained in the letter against raising the value of money
titleStmt.author: Cromarty, George Mackenzie, Earl of, 1630-1714.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Mackenzie, 1st Earl of Cromarty.
A sequel to: 'The mistaken advantage by raising of money, discovered in a letter to a friend'.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
